#summary Welcome to MushAI!

= Introduction =

This project's goal is to through genetic programming evolve an artificial intelligence that can play the abstract strategy board game [http://www.educationallearninggames.com/how-to-play-traverse-game.asp Traverse] (a.k.a. _Taifho_).

This project is developed for the 2010 course [http://www.cse.chalmers.se/edu/course/TIN171/ TIN171 Artificial Intelligence] at [http://chalmers.se/ Chalmers University of Technology].
